```{r setup, include=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}

# read in data, skip first 4 rows

lev <- read_csv(here("data", "mono_lake_annual_levels.csv"), skip = 5) %>% 
  clean_names()

```

```{r}

# plot year vs lake level

ggplot(data  = lev,
       aes(x = year, y = lake_level_feet_above_sea_level)) +
  geom_jitter(fill = "royalblue1", color = "black", pch = 21, size = 2) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Lake Level (ft above sea level)") +
  theme_classic() +
  annotate("text", x = 1938, y = 6401, label = "1941: Mono Lake\nis diverted to\nLos Angeles", size = 3) +
  annotate("text", x = 1941, y = 6376, label = "1978: The Mono\nLake Committee\nis founded", size = 3) +
   annotate("text", x = 1995, y = 6362, label = "1994: State Water\nBoard Decision 1631", size = 3) +
  annotate("text", x = 2010, y = 6405, label = "2013: Mono Basin\nStream Restoration\nAgreement", size = 3) +
   annotate("text", x = 1890, y = 6400, label = "6377 ft: Land bridges\nlet predators cross\nto major nesting sites", size = 3) +
    annotate("text", x = 1890, y = 6363, label = "6360 ft: Salinity of120 g/L;\nDecrease in available food\nsource for waterfowl", size = 3) +
    annotate("segment", x = 1955, xend = 1972, y = 6375, yend = 6375, colour = "red", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
  annotate("segment", x = 1941, xend = 1941, y = 6405, yend = 6415, colour = "red", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
    annotate("segment", x = 1994, xend = 1994, y = 6365, yend = 6373, colour = "red", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
    annotate("segment", x = 2013, xend = 2013, y = 6400, yend = 6383, colour = "red", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
   annotate("segment", x = 1890, xend = 1850, y = 6377, yend = 6377, colour = "darkgreen", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
  annotate("segment", x = 1870, xend = 1850, y = 6360, yend = 6360, colour = "darkgreen", size=1, arrow=arrow()) +
  annotate("segment", x = 1890, xend = 1890, y = 6377, yend = 6394, colour = "darkgreen", size = 1)


```
